The app is designed to be compatible with a range of Xiaomi Smart Fans. The following models should be supported:

• Pedestal Fan P9
• Pedestal Fan P10
• Mija Pedestal Fan
• Pedestal Fan P15
• Mi Smart Standing Fan 2
• Mi Smart Standing Fan 2 Pro

Please Note: While the app is designed to work with all the models listed above, it has only been physically tested on the Mi Smart Standing Fan 2 Pro. Functionality with other models is based on the protocol implementation from the \'python-miio\' library and is not guaranteed.

Welcome to SmartHR FanControl! This guide will help you set up the app in a few simple steps.

Step 1: Obtain Fan IP Address and Token
To control your Xiaomi fan, the app needs its local IP address and a unique 32-character token. A highly recommended tool for this is the "Xiaomi Cloud Tokens Extractor". You can find it by searching online or visiting its GitHub page.

Step 2: Configure the Fan in the App
1. Navigate to the Settings tab.
2. In "Fan Config", enter the IP and Token.
3. Tap SAVE FAN SETTINGS.

Step 3: Pair Your Heart Rate Sensor
1. Navigate to the HR Sensors tab.
2. Tap SEARCH HEART RATE SENSORS.
3. Tap Pair on a detected device, then Select it from the paired list.

Step 4: Configure Auto Mode (Optional)
In Settings -> Auto Mode, you can customize the HR-to-speed curve. Tap the (i) icon for details on each setting. Remember to tap SAVE AUTO MODE SETTINGS.

Step 5: Start Controlling!
1. On the Main screen, turn the fan on using the FAN ON button.
2. Toggle the Auto Mode switch to enable automatic control.

Enjoy your workout!

1. Data Collection and Use
This application is a hobby project and does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. It does not contain advertisements or analytics.

2. Data Storage and Security
All settings (fan IP/token, device addresses) are stored exclusively and encrypted on your device. No data ever leaves your phone.

3. Heart Rate (Biometric) Data
Heart rate data is processed in real-time on your device and is never stored. Enabling the "Heart Rate Sharing" feature is your choice and responsibility.

4. Permissions
Permissions are used exclusively for the app\'s core functionality (communicating with your devices).

5. Third-Party Services
The "Buy Me a Coffee" link redirects to a third-party website, governed by its own privacy policy.

6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time by posting the new policy within the application.
